trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the binary format of a custom attribute is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 自定义特性的二进制格式无效时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: `CustomAttributeFormatException` uses the HRESULT COR_E_FORMAT which has the value 0x80131537.
trans-unit.target: `CustomAttributeFormatException`使用具有值 0x80131537 HRESULT COR_E_FORMAT。

trans-unit.source: `CustomAttributeFormatException` is thrown if a custom attribute on a data type is formatted incorrectly, possibly because of a bug in the tool used to create the data type.
trans-unit.target: `CustomAttributeFormatException`如果上一种数据类型的自定义特性的格式不正确，可能是由于用于创建的数据类型的工具中的 bug 将引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref> class with the default properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref>使用默认属性的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes an instance of `CustomAttributeFormatException` with an empty message string and the root cause exception set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化的实例`CustomAttributeFormatException`有一个空消息字符串和根会导致异常设置为`null`。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the properties of the `Exception` object as follows: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|null| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The empty string ("").|
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数设置的属性`Exception`对象，如下所示: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| null | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|空字符串 ("")。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref>使用指定的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the properties of the Exception object as follows: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`|
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数设置的异常对象的属性，如下所示: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`|</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that indicates the reason this exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 引发此异常指示的原因的消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref> class with the specified serialization and context information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref>使用指定的序列化和上下文信息的类。

trans-unit.source: The data for serializing or deserializing the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 用于序列化或反序列化的自定义属性数据。

trans-unit.source: The source and destination for the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 源和目标自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException>.</xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The `inner` exception.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`inner`异常。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `inner` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`inner`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。
